title: Digipanda

comments.author: DapanasFruit
comments.body: I actually love the DigiPanda name...and this reminds me of the food delivery app called Panda which is already available here in my country especially in the metropolis. Anyway, we should always be open to any new entrants to the crypto space but projects should prove that they got something innovative on their sleeves otherwise it would just be another project having the intent to take as much money as they can. I hope to read the things DigiPanda is solidly offering that we can call as new and something interesting, in the first place.

comments.author: danherbias07
comments.body: ^Many investors are open to anything. But, when you start your discussion with "going to the moon" "1000x" and the "next trend" something doesn't feel right about it. It's too good to be true and there are many ways to make this more appealing than those words. No one believes in those things anymore and it sounded like a clickbait. An old investor's first impression would always be a scammy attempt. It's better to present a project, inform who is on the team, make it clear about what their goal is, and so on and forth. It's not like we are buying here with fake money, those will be real money that could've been spent on better projects with better service.

comments.author: gurunanakji777
comments.body: Anything can happen in the cryptocurrency market, but the claim of a 1000x potential, as you mentioned, doesn't appear credible. It's not realistic for a project to achieve a 1000x increase in value solely by distributing free coins. Even though I am an active crypto user, I've never come across this "Digipanda." Please don't take offense, my friend, but the marketing outreach for your altcoin seems insufficient. To begin with, promote it effectively and build a robust Digipanda community.You haven't disclosed any information about your current funding, and the absence of a roadmap raises concerns. Setting such high expectations without proper planning appears disingenuous. A genuine target wouldn't involve expecting a 1000x increase at this stage. Achieving that will require substantial effort. Mere words won't suffice, as evidenced by the numerous exchanges that provided free offers and disappeared unnoticed. Therefore, my advice remains: focus on promotion, enhance your credibility in the market, and only then contemplate the potential success of your project.
